thread.title: A day in Yountville for under $40
thread.title_full: A day in Yountville for under $40 - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Deb Wandell
title: A day in Yountville for under $40
text:
Photo: Sarah Rice, Special To The Chronicle Tables and chairs are set in the French Laundry Culinary Garden in Yountville. Tables and chairs are set in the French Laundry Culinary Garden in...
Once-sleepy Yountville has become a full-blown culinary destination. The tiny town boasts seven restaurants on The Chronicle’s Top 100 list, including the Michelin three-star French Laundry (home of the $295 lunch). Tucked between are luxury hotels, boutiques, tasting rooms and fancy shops inside those tasting rooms where visitors can sip Syrah while coveting thousand-dollar hammered copperware pots. Tables and chairs are set in the French Laundry Culinary Garden in Yountville. Tables and chairs are set in the French Laundry Culinary Garden in...
Once-sleepy Yountville has become a full-blown culinary destination. The tiny town boasts seven restaurants on The Chronicle’s Top 100 list, including the Michelin three-star French Laundry (home of the $295 lunch). Tucked between are luxury hotels, boutiques, tasting rooms and fancy shops inside those tasting rooms where visitors can sip Syrah while coveting thousand-dollar hammered copperware pots.
